评论详情: Had to return this dress, the sizes were completely off.

评论概述: Material is not as expected but cute still
评论详情: My 12yo picked out this cute dress for Christmas and really loved it. The material is a bit spandexy (that more stretchy material) but was comfortable and looked good.

评论概述: Really sexy outfit, slightly tightish but stretchy
评论详情: I really like this skirt, I do have to knock off a star because it's tight in my shoulders and torso, however it IS stretchy.  It's sized a bit small but that's common with asian manufacturers, Im a 3 in Torrid sizes and I bought the 5X here.
Doesn’t match the picture such a disappointment I had such high hopes

评论概述: Costume Dress, runs small, especially in the bust
评论详情: Overall this is not a bad product, but I wish they made it in larger sizes. I bought a 5x the largest they had. I normally can wear a 3X, or a US size 24, and have a 42D bust. This would fit on my body, but was very snug and the upper lace section that was supposed to look like a bra or at least cover the bust area ended up looking more like a bow across my chest. The material is a bit thin. It is best to think of this as a costume and definitely I think the 5X is more like an American 2X, or 22, maybe even a 20. I really liked it and wanted it for a Halloween costume so I wouldn't have minded that it wasn't very high quality. I thought the price was good for the level of what you got. Just wish it came in bigger sizes. Sadly it is going back to Amazon.

Fabric is stretchy and soft which makes it very comfortable, definitely not made for busty girls, small in the chest - resulting in the buttons coming up where they shouldn't be. Bought for an event based on the decent pictures but this is more like a cheap Halloween costume, returning it for sure. Not worth the money at all really.
This is a really good quality dress for the price! I am 5ft6in, 137 pounds, with a large chest (DD), and it fits me perfect, size large. I am extremely happy and just love the dress!
I ordered a size 3 xl and got a dress that I would call a medium.  Maybe cause it's made in China and they have no idea what a 3 xl should look like.  Hope I can find someone who wants it.
Fit better than expected. Worth the money although it was a great buy anyway
I don't wear a 3X OR 4X !! NEITHER ONE FIT. SUPER TIGHT AT BUST AND WAIST
It is not made for big-chested women. The fit is great on everything else but the chest area is not flattering. I recommend looking at the sizing chart before ordering. I am a 2X/3X and the 5X fit.
I should have gone with a bigger size for my chest was a little confined tightly. Otherwise it was a great for it's use.
